trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds a **Property** tab to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将“属性”选项卡添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The **Property** tab type to add to the grid.
trans-unit.target: 要向网格添加的“属性”选项卡类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a **Property** tab of the specified type to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将一个指定类型的“属性”选项卡添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The **Property** tab is added to the collection with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope> value of `Global`.
trans-unit.target: **属性**选项卡添加到具有集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope>值`Global`。

trans-unit.source: The **Property** tab type to add to the grid.
trans-unit.target: 要向网格添加的“属性”选项卡类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Adds a **Property** tab of the specified type and with the specified scope to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将一个指定类型并具有指定范围的“属性”选项卡添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the tabs to clear.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的选项卡的范围。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the **Property** tabs of the specified scope from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定范围的所有“属性”选项卡。

trans-unit.source: This method clears the tabs of the specified scope or smaller.
trans-unit.target: 此方法清除指定作用域的或更小的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The `tabScope` parameter must be the `Component` or `Document` value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope>.
trans-unit.target: `tabScope`参数必须是`Component`或`Document`值<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value of the <paramref name="tabScope" /> parameter is less than the <see langword="Document" /> value of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 赋给 <paramref name="tabScope" /> 参数的值小于 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabScope" /> 的 <see langword="Document" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of **Property** tabs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中“属性”选项卡的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of **Property** tabs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 数**属性**集合中的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all the **Property** tabs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合中所有“属性”选项卡的枚举。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This method creates an enumerator that contains a snapshot of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建包含快照的集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: You can change the collection by changing the enumerator; however, multiple enumerators can simultaneously access the same collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过更改枚举数; 更改的集合但是，多个枚举器可同时访问同一集合。

trans-unit.source: Changing the collection, either directly or through another enumerator, can cause <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 更改集合中，直接或通过另一个枚举数，可能会导致<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Two enumerators created from the same collection at the same time can contain different snapshots.
trans-unit.target: 从在同一时间相同集合创建的两个枚举器可以包含不同的快照。

trans-unit.source: Removing objects from the enumerator also removes them from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从枚举器删除对象也它们从集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" />。

trans-unit.source: The tab type to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的选项卡类型。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified tab type from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的选项卡类型。

trans-unit.source: Removing the tab from the collection removes it from the property grid.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中删除选项卡上的属性网格中删除它。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的数组，它接收从集合复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified array to receive copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定数组中接收复制内容的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the list is synchronized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则指示列表是同步的；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对基础列表的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。
